assignments.name: Default Lab
assignments.author: Mike Karabinos
assignments.description: Contains the specias, reactions, and solutions used by the Default Stockroom of the Virtual Lab

assignments.name: Iodine Dilution (0.12)
assignments.author: Dave Yaron
assignments.description: Prepare 150.0 ml of 0.06 g/mL iodine solution from a 0.12 g/mL iodine solution.

assignments.name: Iodine Dilution (0.18)
assignments.author: Dave Yaron
assignments.description: Prepare 150.0 ml of 0.06 g/mL iodine solution from a 0.18 g/mL iodine solution.

assignments.name: Dilute Saline Solution
assignments.author: Dave Yaron
assignments.description: Prepare 500ml of 0.0385 M saline solution by diluting 0.154 M saline solution.

assignments.name: Glucose Solution (0.526)
assignments.author: Dave Yaron
assignments.description: Starting with the saline solution, make 500 mL of 0.526 M glucose solution.

assignments.name: Glucose Solution (1.052)
assignments.author: Dave Yaron
assignments.description: Make 500 mL of 1.052 M glucose solution.
